document_data.name: ''Kumakawa''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kumakawa''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[Light armor|light]] [[hide armor]] crafted out of a [[displacer beast]]'s hide.
document_data.Powers: ''Kumakawa'' armor possessed a ''+3'' enchantment to the wearer's defense. Additionally, the item's magics imbued the wearer with reflexes of a predator, increasing their evasion and dexterity.
document_data.History: These sets of potent enchanted armors were named after their inventor, a famed [[artificer]] [[Kumakawa (person)|Kumakawa]], renowned for working with the most exotic skins and hides.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Ammon Jerro]]: the [[warlock]] enemy of the [[King of Shadows]] and a reluctant ally of [[Kalach-Cha]] in [[1374 DR]].
*[[Tusk (orc)|Tusk]]: an [[orc]] leader of [[elf]]-massacring [[Gutripper]] tribe from [[Thar]] and the brother of [[Grunt Steelstorm|Grunt "Elf" Steelstorm]], ally of the [[Hero of Daggerford]] in [[1373 DR]].
